testcase.classname: This feature file contains Student Admission Test Scenarios
testcase.name: Student Admission
testcase.system-out: Given a CTSMS user is on the home page "https://chroma.mexil.it/site/login".passed When the user logs in with valid credentials, username "general@teacher.com" and password "123456".passed And navigates to Student Information module.................................passed And navigates to Student Admission submodule................................passed And enters Student Admission number "12901".................................passed And selects class "Cyber Security" and section "Networking Fundamentals"....passed And enters first name "Rafsan" and last name "Chowdhury"....................passed And selects "Male" under gender dropdown....................................passed And selects DOB "01/13/1999"................................................passed And enters email address "test1@gmail.com"..................................passed And enters mobile number "718727277"........................................passed And enters father's name "Pops".............................................passed And enters father's number "221112222"......................................passed And enters father's occupation "Lawyer".....................................passed And enters mother's name "<MOTHER NUMBER>"..................................passed And enters mother's number "133333333"......................................passed And enters mother's occupation "Architect"..................................passed And if father radio button is selected for guardian.........................passed Then clicks Save button.....................................................passed Then student record is succesfully deleted with class "Cyber Security" and section "Networking Fundamentals" and admission number "12901".passed
